titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a free trade agreement with the Republic of the Philippines.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/14/2010--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a free trade agreement with the Republic of the Philippines.
